DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect gender pharmacodynamic interaction propofol dexmedetomidine , explore effect gender propofol unconsciousness median effective concentration different dose dexmedetomidine .
DOC.detailed_description: 60 case male patient randomly divide four group , 60 female patient also randomly divide four groups.In group , dexmedetomidine target plasma concentration 0,0.4,0.6,0.8 ng/ml . Dexmedetomidine administer 15 min target control infusion propofol . The propofol infusion start provide target effect-site concentration 1.0 ug/ml , increase 0.2 ug/ml loss consciousness effect-site concentration target concentration equilibrium .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Weight:18≦ BMI≦25 2 . Written informed consent patient relatives participate patient . 1 . A previous history intolerance study drug relate compound additive . 2 . Existing significant haematological , endocrine , metabolic gastrointestinal disease .
